short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Land Insights Toolkit for real estate land investors. Adds data overlays to Zillow, Redfin, and Land.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Land Insights extension is a tool for all serious land investors.

Our team of “land flipping scientists” have quantified that the Land Insights extension saves the average dirt flipper over 30 minutes per day.

Some have even reported the serious side effect of seeing more accurate offers & expanding bank statements. 

Here’s how…

🔸 Instantly see “price per acre” and “price per square foot” on all listings (sold & active).
🔸 Avoid the pain of toggling to see the “land filter”& “sold filter” on MLS platforms (this comes auto-selected).

The Land Insights extension also works on all real estate marketplace websites (RedFin, Zillow, Land.com, etc).

🚀 How to use?
🔸 Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to your toolbar.
🔸 Visit Redfin, Zillow or Land.com

📪 Contact us:
Any questions or suggestions? Give us a shout at 💌 hello@landinsights.co
